mods:mods.mods:note: Born-Digital Materials - Carton 11 - Computer disks / tapes
mods:mods.mods:abstract: The capacity of CM01 is 2049 MB and CM01.dd is the image file created by AccessData's FTK software. CM01.txt is the log for the imaging process; CM01.csv is the directory listing of the files in the image; CM01_1.jpg and CM01_2.jpg are the photograph images of the drive.
